name: Rama Residence Padma
priceRange: $66 - $168 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)

reviews.review: We just got home from a week in Bali staying at the Rama Residence Padma. Let me say this hotel is amazing! Great location, great staff, great hotel.. From the moment we arrived and until we left, ALL the staff were happy, friendly and could...

Amazing staff and very comfortable. Roof pool awesome for watching the sunsets. Really enjoyed sitting in the restaurant and watching the busy shops and traffic go by while enjoying lovely Eggs Benedict for brekkie. Will definately be back again.

We stayed 8 nights and we loved this Hotel. The staff so friendly and helpful free 2 hour cocktails on the pool deck each Monday. The Staff Dilan, Gede, and Ninda were exceptional along with the rest of the friendly smiling staff.

My family stayed here for 2 weeks. The location is what drew me here, 5 minutes to Legian Beach. Fat Bowl next door and amongst all the best restaurants in the area. We booked the family suite and it didn’t disappoint! Lots of room, credit...

reviews.quotes: Excellent with a few minor issues
reviews.review: I would have given this hotel 4½ points if that was available. The room was generous and having kitchen facilities was great. The staff were all really friendly and helpful. Having toiletries as fixed items reduced the environmental impact. Having a wash line in the...

Feels like home when you stay here and what a wonderful hospitable house manager Indri Marley was! She is a credit to your hotel. Went out of her way to find us what we were looking for and always a smile on her face! If...

My stay at Rama Residence was really great... we had a studio room which had a water dispenser with hot & cold drinking water which was so convenient. Bed was comfortable, the room was always nice & cool which was a relief from the heat...

Stayed here in summer and the location of the hotel is 10/10 quiet yet central. Rooms were clean and staff amazing. Ate in the restaurant and the food was lovely. Loved our breakfast each morning too. Had a day around the pool, lovely and relaxing,...

reviews.quotes: best location in Legian! Magnificent sunset views!
reviews.review: We stayed 8 nights in early November. I had booked 7 nights through booking.com for a wedding but had to add an extra night so we could attend the hens/bucks parties. I had trouble paying directly to the hotel, something to do with my bank,...

I was upgraded the minute I arrived. It was a four room unit (Bedroom, lounge area, dining area, kitchen and two bathrooms. I was on the top floor near the roof top pool.I could not believe my luck. The staff were courteous and very friendly...

This is an excellent hotel, rooms were amazing and pool had awesome views and its location is great. Breakfast was really nice and staff were very helpful. My family and I will definitely be staying here again!

The room is clean and tidy with a very comfortable king sized bed. The location is convenient. There are many restaurants and massage shops nearby. The beach is also within 2 km away. The swimming pool of the hotel is amazing with a really nice...

reviews.quotes: My new "go to" property in Legian
reviews.review: They have thought of absolutely everything ....right down to an iron, scissors you name it... its there. The staff were fantastic throughout the entire property. The pool ... wow what a lovely setting. The restaurant has an extensive menu and very obliging staff. Indri took...

reviews.quotes: Clean, new, understated and  family friendly
reviews.review: We really enjoyed our stay. The rooms are big, clean and modern. Our bed was very comfortable.The room top area is amazing and a great spot to chill out. The only downfall was the over priced breakfast and terrible coffee. The service was great and...

The hotel is in a great location in Legian very close to the beach. The pool is on the roof and provides lovely views of the sunset. The staff were very friendly and helpful. The room was very well equipped with kitchen facilities, 2 televisions...
